column5: Validate AWS MGN replication for server migration
column6: AWS MGN agent installed on source server
column7: 1. Initialize replication 2. Monitor replication status 3. Verify data sync 4. Check replication lag
column8: Replication completes with <1 hour lag and no data loss

column5: Validate AWS DMS for database migration
column6: DMS replication instance and endpoints configured
column7: 1. Start replication task 2. Monitor CDC status 3. Validate record counts 4. Check data consistency
column8: Database replication with zero data loss and <30 second lag

column6: Server replicated and tested in AWS
column7: 1. Launch test instance from replicated AMI 2. Verify application startup 3. Test basic functionality 4. Validate network connectivity
column8: Application starts and responds to health checks

column5: Validate application connectivity to migrated RDS
column6: Database migrated to RDS and accessible
column7: 1. Update application connection strings 2. Test database connection 3. Execute sample queries 4. Verify transaction processing
column8: Application connects to RDS with expected performance

column6: VPC and subnets configured per design
column7: 1. Test inter-subnet connectivity 2. Verify security group rules 3. Test NAT Gateway outbound 4. Validate VPC endpoints
column8: All network paths function per architecture design

column5: Validate Direct Connect or VPN connectivity to on-premise
column7: 1. Test connectivity to on-premise AD 2. Verify bandwidth throughput 3. Test failover (if VPN backup) 4. Measure latency
column8: Hybrid connectivity meets 1Gbps throughput with <50ms latency

column5: Validate S3 data migration via DataSync
column6: DataSync agent configured and task complete
column7: 1. Compare source and destination counts 2. Validate file checksums 3. Test application access to S3 4. Verify permissions
column8: All files transferred with 100% integrity

column5: Business user validation of Wave 1 migrated applications
column7: 1. Execute business workflows 2. Test all user functions 3. Validate data accuracy 4. Sign off on functionality
column8: Business users accept migrated application functionality

column7: 1. Execute load test 2. Measure response times 3. Compare to baseline 4. Document variance

column5: Validate Auto Scaling Group behavior under load

column8: ASG scales correctly between min and max based on load

column5: Validate security group rules per design
column7: 1. Test allowed traffic flows 2. Verify blocked traffic 3. Test cross-tier rules 4. Validate egress rules
column8: Security groups enforce design rules correctly

column5: Validate data encryption at rest with KMS

column7: 1. Verify EBS encryption 2. Check RDS encryption 3. Validate S3 encryption 4. Test key rotation
column8: All data encrypted at rest with KMS CMK

column7: 1. Initiate failover 2. Measure failover time 3. Validate application reconnection 4. Verify data consistency

column7: 1. Execute administrative actions 2. Query CloudTrail logs 3. Verify log completeness 4. Test S3 log delivery
column8: All API activity logged with required detail for SOC 2
